awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.

plot: An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.
title: Good Morning, Vietnam

tomatoes.consensus: A well-calibrated blend of manic comedy and poignant drama, Good Morning, Vietnam offers a captivating look at a wide range of Robin Williams' cinematic gifts.
